title: Harrowing skin ideas 2017-18
body:
So I thought of some harrowing skin ideas 

1. Gravekeeper Braum-his shield could be a Coffin lid or a tombstone his Q could be a skull his wall ability could be a ghost shield that has spectral particles and his ult could be a crack in the ground with ghoulish particles coming out of the crack in the ground and tombstones on the side.

2. Taliyah De los Muertos or Day of the Dead Taliyah- Her Q could shoot bones and the unholy ground could be a sugar skull design. Her W could be a skeletal hand that nocks the enemy up. Her E could be a bunch of small sugar skulls. and her R could be a wall made of bones

3. Pumpkinhead Bard- His meeps could be ghost his chimes could be wisp. His Q could be very ghostly and when it stuns the enemy to a wall it displays a scary pumpkin face. His W could be little pumpkins that grown in power. His E could be a portal that has ghost spinning in the entrance and when anyone goes in it shows you as a Bat flying through it. His R indicator on the ground could be a giant Scary Pumpkin Face.

4.Snake Charmer Illaoi- Her tentacles are replaced with Cobras. Her Q could be her slapping them with a snake . Her W could be her jumping on them while it makes a Hissing noise. Her E could be a spectral Snake that pulls out the soul,the markings underneath them could be snakes that circle around them after they break the line they have a cobra icon above there head and have a green aura around them. Her ult could have the sound of like a snake charmer before slamming the ground and summoning Cobras that bite/strike enemies. 

5. Weather Lord Aurelion Sol- I could see them doing small tornados swirling around for his passive. His Q could be a giant Storm cloud kinda like a hurricane funnel. His W could be him expanding the Tornados they are further out and become a bit bigger visual wise. His E he could turn part dragon part nimbus cloud. His ult could be a huge Wind/thunder blast that nocks enemies back and emits the sound of thunder cracking when he uses it.

These are just ideas I had that I think would be really cool I tried to do some champs that didn't have skins mostly that I feel would be cool. Give me your thoughts and Feedback :D
